resources.string: Superior OS is a Custom ROM based on AOSP, with some most required minimal features, the main aim of this ROM is to deliver light speed performance,smoothness and good battery backup.
These are the Official Devices Maintainers...
Press on color below to apply
Select certian apps to hide in recents
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Allow to use Home button when device is ringing
Button backlight brightness will adjust based on current screen brightness level
Button backlight will only appear when buttons are pressed rather than on all the time. Timeout still impacts this feature.
Double tap lock screen to put the device to sleep
Double tap on statusbar to put the device to sleep
Toggle to enable disable hw keys
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Show visualizer on lockscreen when music is playing
Enables the advanced reboot menu for rebooting options such hot, recovery and bootloader. Also adds as an option to restart SystemUI
Enable the ability to show and use the power menu dialog while on the lockscreen
Show the reboot option on the lockscreen
Show the advanced reboot option on the lockscreen
Show the screenshot option on the lockscreen
Show the airplane mode option on the lockscreen
Display power button options that turns off extended access and fingerprint unlocking
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Swipe three fingers to take screenshot
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Drag selection on the area you want to take as a screenshot
Customize screenshot attributes like time, delay,type etc
Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode
Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Show a brightness slider on bottom quick settings
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Change the default font of the lockscreen date widget
Blink flashlight only in ringer mode
Blink flashlight only in DND mode
Long press volume buttons to switch tracks while screen off
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Display the app\'s icon corresponding with the toast
When using swipe up home navigation to open recents, only stock recents are supported
Display the cross sign next to signal bar when data is disabled
Double tap power to toggle torch (will add a small delay to single tap)
Long press power to toggle torch
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Use bottom swipe up gestures for navigation

Navigation bar must be disabled!

Available gestures:

Back
- Swipe up on left or right side

Home
- Swipe up center

Recent apps
- Swipe up center and hold

Last app
- Short swipe up and hold in the center
Heigth from bottom to trigger swipe
Timeout before the gesture action is started
Block screen and button inputs when device is in pocket
Delay until long press action starts
Trigger back gesture on landscape from
Back gesture must start below this percentage of the screen
Show animated feedback on edges when back gesture is used
Show heads up only for dialer or messaging app
Show volume panel on the left side of the screen
Enable to use an alternative recents screen
Customize the additional settings for slim recents
Clear recents by long-pressing the memory bar
Apply a custom icon pack for apps in the panel
Image to show when no recent apps
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Apps to not show in the panel
Tap here to add, tap on added app to remove it
Show app shortcuts on the other edge
Show app shortcuts on the other edge
Choose apps to show in the sidebar
Configure the content of the app sidebar
Change the look of the sidebar
Reduce recents opening lag by disabling this
Use default statusbar height in Hide
This is test for selected toast animation
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Unlock device with fingerprint after reboot without PIN/Password/Pattern\nNote: at your own risk!
Show buttons to increase or decrease the brightness
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevents burn-in on OLED devices by shifting pixels every so often

Smart pixels is a power saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see a significant improvement in battery life. For a good user experience, we recommend you set the amount of disabled pixels at 75 percent.
Show the clock widget on the lockscreen
Show the date, weather, alarms and zen on the lockscreen
These are power saving features. They may interfere with services intended to run at idle, like navigation apps. You can whitelist these apps from being affected in the app battery settings.
Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver
Position clear button and some immersive style
Enable or disable ram bar in recent app view
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
Roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Disable expanding quick settings on secure lock screens
Play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen on

Ambient Music Ticker shows playing music track info within Ambient display screen.

It's triggered also if Ambient Display is disabled when a new track is started, forcing a clean ambient screen with track info in the middle of the screen.

You can also use long press volume buton to skip track.
Display and customize battery bar near status bar or navigation bar
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level
Allow to customize Gaming Mode options
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will automatically be turned on for the selected apps.
Block all headsup messages except calls.
Disable hardware buttons when Gaming mode is turned on.
Lock screen brightness when Gaming mode is turned on.
Whenever you open any app and the system finds it to be a game, it will be added in gaming list automatically. Please note that this does not work for every game app.
Show a notification when the battery is fully charged
Force apps that support expanded notifications
Shows white visualization bars on ambient display unless custom color is selected
Display Running Services icon in quick settings footer
Display Settings icon in quick settings footer
Display the tile edit icon in quick settings footer
Display Multi-user switcher icon in quick settings footer
Swap the alert slider modes order (only for devices with alert slider support)
